definitions.text: something that is conceived or that exists independently and not in relation to other things; something that does not depend on anything else and is beyond human control; something that is not relative
examples: no mortal being can influence the absolute

definitions.text: complete and without restriction or qualification; sometimes used informally as intensifiers
examples: got the job through sheer persistence

definitions.text: expressing finality with no implication of possible change
examples: an absolute guarantee to respect the nation's authority

definitions.text: not capable of being violated or infringed
